name: file-system-access
description: File System Access API implementation (ponyfill) with pluggable storage adapters via IndexedDB, Cache API, in-memory etc.

scripts.test: npm run check-no-top-level-await && npm run test-node
scripts.test-node: npm run build && cd test && node test-node.js
scripts.test-deno: npm run build && cd test && deno run --allow-read --allow-net --allow-write test-deno.js
scripts.deploy-gh-pages: npm run build && rm -rf gh-dist && mkdir gh-dist && cp -r lib test example README.md gh-dist/ && gh-pages -d gh-dist -m 'Deploy gh-pages [ci skip]'

author: Alexandru Ciuca
